pageContent: LOGINLOGOUTHELPPrinter FriendlyPageEarthfiles, news category.Share:DiggFacebookStumbleUpon Abductee Jim Sparks Comments On Alien Symbol Technology© 2008 by Linda Moulton Howe“I know that flashing symbols is a method of gettinginformation from E. T. to E. T., or E. T. to human. It’s a fast wayof transmitting a tremendous amount of data, in a short timeand retaining it.” - Jim Sparks, Author and Abductee Click for podcast. Also see YouTube for Fox Network video of January 19, 2008,videotape by David Caron near Stephenville municipal airport.February 22, 2008 Las Vegas, Nevada - In 1995, at a conference about the humanabduction syndrome, I met one of the participants named Jim Sparks, born Jim Sparacinoto his Italian parents on November 15, 1954.Jim Sparks, born Jim Sparacino on November 15, 1954,to Italian parents. Photograph courtesy Jim Sparks.See More Information below about Jim's work.Unlike many abductees who experience loss of consciousness and missing time, Jim’sinteractions with what he calls “aliens” have been mostly conscious. Even back in 1995,Jim Sparks made a clear distinction between what he described as small, grey, droneworker types that are different from taller, “true aliens,” or supervisors.Jim explained that when he was thirty-four years old in 1988, he was happily married andhad thriving real-estate work in both Texas and North Carolina. Then suddenly, beingsfrom other worlds entered his life and he thought he was losing his mind. Jim Sparks hadinteractions with different types: one category was the grey-skinned, large dark eyes, thatapparently come in many varieties, including small androids that do work for taller,independently intelligent, controllers.

Jim Sparks's depiction of the small, alien android entities monitoringhis training in alien “classroom” where Jim was forced to learn a symbol language.Drawing by Jose Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks.Jim also had a conscious, face-to-face encounter with several tall, reptilian-skinned,humanoids. Jim says those reptilians warned that the Earth’s environment is facing a crisisand the planet must be saved, whether humans survive or not.Jim Sparks's depiction of the tall, reptilian humanoids,that had gold eyes with black vertical pupils like an alligator's eyes.Drawing by Josi Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks.Young alligator photographed in Florida.From 1988 into the 1990s, Jim was schooled by the grey-skinned beings in front ofcomputers and 3-dimensional projections. Jim was forced to learn the alien symbols andnumbers. Eventually, Jim says he was also contacted by alleged U. S. governmentintelligence operatives who wanted to know about the alien symbols and numbers.

“Real alien” supervisor that appeared with powerful presence and orderedJim Sparks to write his question in alien symbols after Sparks argued with small,grey “drones.” Drawing by Jose Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks.Jim has always stressed that when people see aerial craft jump from one side of the sky tothe other, or see entities that appear translucent and walk through solid walls, or feel aweight go down on their bed, but cannot see what’s making the weight – it’s all advanced,alien technologies.Since Jim Sparks was taken from his home by a non-human beam technology over severalyears and educated in front of alien computer screens to learn alien symbols and numbers,I asked him to study the Stephenville, Texas, symbols videotaped by David Caron onJanuary 19, 2008, to see if Jim could see any meaning in the symbols. I talked with Jim thisweek about his impressions of the projected 3-dimensional and colorful “symbols” by theaerial disc near the Stephenville municipal airport.One video frame of hundreds, each 3-dimensional “symbol”segmented in colors and intricately structured. January 19, 2008,near Stephenville municipal airport by David Caron.See YouTube Fox Network video.Interview:

Tw enty pages of English text retold in only tw o pages of alien symbols,further reduced to one-half page in alien shorthand and further reduced to one circle of shorthandsymbols equivalent to the full 20-page English text. Drawings by Jose Galante © 1996 for Jim Sparks.Jim Sparks, Author, The Keepers: An Alien Message for the Human Race © 2006, LasVe g a s , N e va d a : “What stands out the most is that the symbols flashed, and not so muchas I recognized them specifically as the symbols I’m familiar with – in some cases sort ofsimilar. But the fact that the symbols flashed is similar to how communication takes placein the galactic neighborhood, so to speak. The technology exists to flash a symbol - say,before a human being – and at the time you might get the whole picture and understandwhat the symbol means, even if it is equivalent to 50 pages of English text. The symbolcontent could even be as much as an entire feature movie. Or a symbol will be flashed,presented before you that way, and you’ll absorb the message, but you will begin tounderstand it only at a later time. So that’s what stood out for me the most – the fact thesymbols (in Texas) flashed that way.When I saw your short video of the symbols, I did not get the meaning at that moment, so Ibelieve the meaning of the symbols will come later.SO, THE RAPIDITY IN THE CHANGE OF SYMBOLS IS SOMETHING YOURECOGNIZE FROM YOUR OWN EXPERIENCE?Yes, the best way for me to explain something like that is if I mentioned a movie to you. IfI were to say, for example, Gone With The Wind. Most people have seen that movie. Or ifI were to say, Independence Day – your mind is capable of seeing that entire movie in aflash – the emotions behind it, what the movie was about, how it began and how it endedbecause you sat through an hour or two of watching it at a slow speed, which is how youwere receiving the data. The mind is capable of retaining that data in a flash. Non-humanintelligent beings in the so-called galactic neighborhood communicate that way. They canflash symbols and you can get the whole meaning of a 2-hour movie, or the full meaning ofwhatever message they were trying to get across. So, that’s something I saw that was verysimilar to the Texas symbols.In Texas, what I find fascinating is the way the symbols are presented. I call it ‘flashed.’ Iknow that flashing symbols is a method of getting information from E. T. to E. T., or E. T.to human. It’s a fast way of transmitting a tremendous amount of data in a short time andretaining it. So, I definitely see that in Texas, too. Abductees Shown “Future Images”of Environmentally Troubled EarthWE’RE SPEAKING IN FEBRUARY 2008. FROM ALL YOUR PERSONALEXPERIENCES WITH THE NON-HUMAN INTELLIGENCES THAT YOUINTERACTED WITH, DO YOU HAVE ANY CLEAR SENSE RIGHT NOW ABOUT

WHAT MIGHT UNFOLD THIS YEAR AND INTO THE NEAR FUTURE?For myself personally, and for millions of other human abductees, we were informed aboutthe condition of the environment. We were told there is something we need to do and weneed to do it sooner than later so we don’t destroy ourselves. With humans at the helm,that’s the direction we have been going.The fact is that these E. T. technologies are not just in E. T. hands, but they are in thehands of human beings. But, of course, Black Budget and Above Top Secret classificationsmean these technologies are not getting out to the public. I do know that some of thethings in the government’s possession include non-polluting free energy. There is anothertechnology that is so phenomenal that will draw matter out of water, meaning draw outpollutants. You can clean the sea pretty quickly, all the Earth’s seas. There is alsotechnology that will take pollutants out of the atmosphere. There are technologies thatexist, which can re-generate the planet’s wildlife, meaning in the rainforest vegetation andgrowth.There is a growing number of people in the Black Budget agencies, who want to see theseE. T. technologies come out into the world and make a difference (in our survival) and sothe human species can evolve, including extending life beyond your wildest dreams, or noteven dying!So, according to sources, the Black Budget agencies want to see an amnesty bill or anavenue created where they can voluntarily come out, not by force and be forced todisclose everything that they have. But if an individual or group chooses to come forwardwith these E. T. technologies and the truth about extraterrestrial life, there could be avoluntary avenue and those individuals or agencies cannot be prosecuted. Those peopleare concerned about their own hides, quite frankly. That’s a big reason why some of thisstuff does not come out.Let’s face it, over the past 50 to 60 years, people have been discredited for having thisknowledge and trying to get it forward. People have been maimed and in some cases,people have been killed. Those are crimes against humanity. when you come forward withthese kinds of E. T. technologies and the truth about extraterrestrials, in that same bagyou’re going to have to come out with what we humans did to keep this stuff secret – whatour government did for national security. If there is 100% amnesty, meaning the BlackBudget people cannot be charged anymore for those crimes – and, of course, they couldnot do that anymore after amnesty were declared – I think we could really see a change onthe face of the planet beyond our wildest dreams.WHY WOULD THE NON-HUMANS HAVE ALLOWED OUR GOVERNMENT ANDOTHER GOVERNMENTS TO SUPPRESS ADVANCED TECHNOLOGIES IN THEFIRST PLACE THAT WOULD HAVE SOLVED OUR ENERGY ANDENVIRONMENTAL PROBLEMS?The way I see it, and maybe others do, too. Things have happened in stages, meaning thatfrom the 1940s to the 1950s, there were ‘flying saucers’ in those days, flying discs in theair. Good, clear black and white photographs were taken. That really cannot be denied.Also, in that day, we had nothing even close to that disc technology. So, we were paranoid,the government was paranoid.I think the biggest problem in those early years was the fact that if the E. T.s were benign,that’s good – but what if the E. T.s were doing things we did not like? There was nothingwe could do about it. We had to catch up with that technology by shooting the discs down,by trying to make contact and everything we could without having the public know. Butmost of us were smart enough to know that these discs were certainly there in the skies.Of course, we were being told one lie after the next and I think in those early years, thatwas to try to catch up with the technology, to have something to respond back (militarily)if it was something our government did not like. So, they could not come out to the publicand say, ‘Hey, these things exist. We don’t know what they are or where they are comingfrom and there is nothing we can do about it.’And as the years went on, some of these things crashed. I think we all know the story of U.S. Army Lt. Col. Philip J. Corso [author of The Day After Roswell © 1997]. Some of theextraterrestrial technologies were placed in the hands of American industries. We formeddifferent agencies to back-engineer crashed discs. In some cases, the government evenrecovered living non-human beings.And as time has gone on, I believe that contact and agreements were actually made towork side-by-side in certain areas in secret also.Now, according to the information that I have, we were warned even 50 years ago that wewere on a path to create an environment that a human being could not exist in anymore.

Even if the E. T. is not so concerned about us humans, the E. T.s are especially concernedabout this host planet. The E.T.s don’t want to see an environment that is nuked out(nuclear war), biologically wiped out. Or create an atmosphere where nobody can breatheanymore, a nasty place. They want this outpost to be a fresh, clean environment that theycan work in.So, over the years, our government has caught up with a lot of things. Obviously there area lot of agencies – almost any abductee can tell you they have seen paramilitary or militarypersonnel working side-by-side with E. T. We’re getting to the point, I believe, of criticalmass. Environmentally, if we don’t do something, we’re going to be in trouble here withinthe next ten years easily - I mean serious trouble! Playing Back Time: Past, Present and FutureWHEN YOU WERE IN THE CRAFT WITH THE NON-HUMANS AND THEY WERESHOWING YOU SYMBOLS AND THE SCREENS, DID YOU EVER SEE A3-DIMENSIONAL IMAGE OF THE EARTH WITH THE TELEPATHICCOMMUNICATION: ‘THIS IS DEFINITELY WHAT YOUR EARTH IS GOING TOLOOK LIKE AT A SPECIFIC YEAR?In the early years of my experiences I saw that there is no doubt that the technology existsto manipulate time. To what degree? Well, that’s hard to say. I had an abduction scenariowhere the process took approximately two hours, but when I was brought back, I wasbrought back 2 to 3 minutes before I left! At first, I thought it was a mistake. But then Ifigured it was for me to learn something. That was phenomenal.I’ve had abduction experiences where you know in your mind it has been several hours,but when you are returned and look at the clock and it’s only been 15 minutes. Andsometimes the reverse. So, I know that time can be manipulated.In those early years in almost every experience of emotional experiments or extractingsemen, I would get different scenes from different time periods from around the world.Some of the scenes looked like they were way in the distant future. Some looked like theywere pretty much present. Some were in the past. The scenes were never in order andwere a bit disorienting when I could not put a finger on what time period it was or what themeaning was.What I’m realizing over time is, it’s like any other human being. If you give a human apeek at the future, they might do things to plan around what they’ve seen and that couldbe totally out of line from whatever a global agenda might be. Two Earth Futures: One Bleak; One BrightFrom personal experience, I saw what I perceived to be two potential futures. And it wasdivided like a highway as it was presented in hologram form. To the left, was a dark,dreary future that was police state in nature. Very few of us survived us. The skies werealmost black, but a dark grey. Light was emanating from nowhere and yet everywhere, soit was almost as if Earth were glowing like light from the sun was being filtered and thelight was being refracted so there were no shadows. The soil, the ground, had huge, thickcoatings on it of this black, damp, ash-like looking material and the buildings and thestructures and the things that I saw were not destroyed, but yet were coated with this ashystuff.You could see people in this scene and they did not look uncomfortable, meaning that thefew people I did see in this scene looked like they could breathe the atmosphere. But itseemed to be a very dreary place. Something that stuck out that I saw, which bothered me,was there was a community – anywhere America – and in that area was a person inuniform I did not recognize, almost like a Gestapo checkpoint person. That meant that thefew people who survived in that time, when they came into the community, they werechecked. So it did not look good.Now, on the bright side, on the right side of the divided highway, - and then I’ll tell you themessage and you can take it for what it’s worth- it was the complete opposite, meaningthat we had evolved. There was longevity beyond the point of passing away. It was bright,clear, clean. And what was scary to me, even though it was positive, was it looked like thehuman species had evolved to the point where they can span the Cosmos. So, there werenot as many Earth-bound individuals from what I could see (not very many people).So there were two things: the line in the middle that divided the two scenes represented, in

my understanding, how close we are to go one way or the other. And what a dangerous,dangerous, dangerous day we live in! And something so simple as the flip of a coin canmake the difference in which way we go. Clearly, if we go to the left to the dark anddreary, that is a path that’s not a good thing.Clearly if we go the other direction, we can actually join the galactic neighborhood. Andfor the first time, the human species evolves. Will Governments Tell TruthAbout E.T.s Before 2050?IN FEBRUARY 2008, HOW OLD ARE YOU RIGHT NOW?I’m 53-years-old.IN YOUR REMAINING LIFE TIME, HAVE YOU BEEN SHOWN IN ANY WAY THATYOU WILL LIVE TO SEE THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES ANDOTHER GOVERNMENTS TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT THE EXISTENCE OF OTHEREXTRATERRESTRIAL LIFE FORMS?I’m confident that will be revealed. I’m confident (it will happen) in my lifetime. The onlyscary aspect of it is: Will we take the positive route and evolve? Or by merely the flip of acoin take the negative route and not evolve? The odds are that we do not (evolve), but Ithink we can break that inertia because the E. T. technologies are in the hands of humanbeings. Not all the Black Op people are bad. I’m not saying they are great or what they aredoing is right. But I think it’s sad that the government uses people instead of people usingthe government like it’s supposed to be.WHY DON’T THE EXTRATERRESTRIALS FORCE THE GOVERNMENTS OF THISPLANET TO TELL THE TRUTH?They don’t operate that way. This is a very hard thing for the human species to swallow.We as a species tend to want to rely on another source to get us out of jams or to goforward. We’re all in a sense guilty of that. For example, we look to the government to pullus out. We look to God to pull us out.But by forcing a hand for the first time by looking inward and doing these things ourselves– not have E. T. over-power the governments, not have E. T. lead the way because itwon’t have any meaning, it won’t have any depth. I believe, according to them, that theyhave force played scenarios in the last several million years and it did not work.I’ve come to believe that when the human species evolves, it’s not really going to be soconcerned about non-human intelligent life. Yes, I think we will rub shoulders with them,not only on this planet but in outer space and other dimensions. In the galacticneighborhood, they are not warring. In the galactic neighborhood, technologies are soadvanced, you always know if you have an enemy or competition – you always knowwhat they are thinking. It’s a world out there that has differences, but they don’t destroyeach other over the differences because the Cosmos is pretty big.”More Information:
